methods.name: test_half_conversions
methods.docstring:
Checks that all 16-bit values survive conversion
to/from 32-bit and 64-bit float

methods.name: test_half_values
methods.docstring: Confirms a small number of known half values

methods.name: test_half_rounding
methods.docstring: Checks that rounding when converting to half is correct

methods.name: test_half_correctness
methods.docstring:
Take every finite float16, and check the casting functions with
a manual conversion.

methods.name: test_half_ordering
methods.docstring: Make sure comparisons are working right

methods.name: test_half_coercion
methods.docstring: Test that half gets coerced properly with the other types

methods.name: test_half_array_interface
methods.docstring: Test that half is compatible with __array_interface__
